Comments_List: I learned a lot more about the language and culture of Indonesia.
On top of growing my knowledge of the Indonesian language, I learned a lot about their culture as well.
A comprehensive learning of Indonesian language.

The course is great for people who want to learn a new language and are unsure of what exactly they'd like to take to fulfill they're language requirement. Bu Dinny and Pak Indriyo have both been awesome, interactive teachers. They make the class fun and love having athletes like myself in class. The course could use a bit more structure in terms of its order of taught topics, and clarity over which of these topics will appear on subsequent tests. But overall, the positives of this class surely outweigh the negatives. One of my favorite classes here at Yale.
From my perspective, this class possess no weakness. By Dinny brought positive energy to class every day and was passionate about helping us learn and understand.
It is a great course and Bu is fun and a great teacher.
Learning a new language can be tough at times

I would definitely recommend this course to another student - especially an athlete. The teachers are very understanding of, for instance, the occasionally-missed Friday class for an in-season travel day or game.
Yes, a very manageable beginner language.
Yes. If you are at all intrigued by Indonesia, this is the perfect class for you. Even though the workload is relatively small, you learn a lot about the language and culture.
Yes, this course is so fun, the people are great, and the teacher is awesome.
